channel.title: "The System Cannot Find The Path Specified" Error For 508 and 525's sources!
channel.description:
Please help me. Whenever i run a 508 or 525 source the Command Prompt states that "The system cannot find the path specified" i would really appreciate help. I have teamview so i will let you do it manually if u know what ur doing. i have msn - shimlow4313@yahoo.com you can talk to me on there. if its a simple solution u can just post on here.
Please and Thank You, Rang fer lif

item.title: "The System Cannot Find The Path Specified" Error For 508 and 525's sources!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

compile with javac and set your environmental variables

also, post all batch file related questions/issues in the sticky

Read full topic
item.source: "The System Cannot Find The Path Specified" Error For 508 and 525's sources!

item.title: "The System Cannot Find The Path Specified" Error For 508 and 525's sources!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Read full topic
item.source: "The System Cannot Find The Path Specified" Error For 508 and 525's sources!

item.title: "The System Cannot Find The Path Specified" Error For 508 and 525's sources!
item.dc:creator: @rang_fer_lif rang fer lif
item.description:
@rang_fer_lif wrote:

did that. i have jdk 6U15 but still nothing. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 07:44:24 pm[/size][hr]My classpath= CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

and my path = C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin

Read full topic
